install.name: Content - CKforms Form Display
install.author: Cookex Developpment Team
install.description:
Thank you for the installation of CK Forms 1.3.4 Plug-in

Insert the following tag : {ckform formname} and replace the characters set formname with the Ckform fom name you want to insert.
The form have to be created with the Ckform component back-end.

If you have any problems, contact webmaster@cookex.eu
Visit the CK Form web site for the lastest news and update.
